verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I sought the Lord and I heard He was in me;
The Lord is dwelling in the heart of praise,
I found the Lord in the midst of His people,
The Lord is dwelling in His praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us praise Him, let us praise Him,
Let us praise Him in the song and dance,
Let us praise Him, let us praise Him,
Let us praise Him in the dance.
